roleset.name: inconspicuous
roleset.note: SUBTLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from subtle.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Some increased melanocytes , expending to the upper layer of epidermis and close to the surgical margin are seen -LRB- block C7 -RRB- ; however findings are too subtle to be interpreted as margin positive .
